IDepthCameraDevice

Interface for depth cameras

Functions

IImage** ppColorImage,
IImage** ppDepthImage,
IImage** ppIRImage
) = 0

Retrieves the next color/depth/ir image from the camera

Parameters
ppColorImage
IImage**

returns the next color image retrieved from the camera. Maybe nullptr.

ppDepthImage
IImage**

returns the next depth image retrieved from the camera. Maybe nullptr.

ppIRImage
IImage**

returns the next infrared image retrieved from the camera. Maybe nullptr.
